name: BGP Api
body:
# BGP API

[bgpapi](http://github.com/abh/bgpapi) runs as a "parsed-route-backend"
to [ExaBGP](http://code.google.com/p/exabgp/) and provides an HTTP API
to some BGP data.

It is implemented in Go (golang).

### Author
